remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现具有的操作系统当前视觉样式的选项卡控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制选项卡控件，请使用方法来绘制页上，使用方法，以便绘制每个选项卡。To draw a tab control, use the method to draw the page, and use the method to draw each tab. 如果视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区在操作系统中启用了可视样式，此类方法将绘制具有当前视觉样式的选项卡控件。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style. 否则的方法和属性的此类将引发。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，请检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和绘制具有两个选项卡的基本选项卡控件的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a basic tab control with two tabs.
